games.author: Anonymous
games.description: A Christmas themed one button platformer, this special entry for Space is Key is short and sweet, a perfect little stocking stuffer. There are 3 more Space is Key games included in Flashpoint if you enjoyed this one, so be sure to give them a go!

games.author: Greett
games.description: This is an addicting puzzle game that tests your logic, but you will feel like a genius when you finally figure out the solution. Factory Balls has a simple concept that can be easily figured out, but even the smartest of us will be scratching their heads at the later levels.

games.author: Anonymous
games.description: A simple management game about selling Christmas Tree before Christmas.

games.author: RB
games.description: Very awesome bowling game with a twist. It's an autoscroller game, has powerups, and most importantly: it's a lore-heavy game. I've never seen a bowling game full of lore lol. also there's an arctic setting.

games.author: Greett
games.description: This point and click adventure game will surely make you rack your brains and it features cute monkeys. What more to wish for during this holiday season? Help Santa fix the workshop and get him on his way to make the monkey go happy!

games.author: Ganonthegreat
games.description: This is a massive site full of collectable badges and minigames, with weekly events and updates as time goes on. It's intended to be played across the entire Christmas period, and Flashpoint is now the only place that can do that.

games.author: Greett
games.description: What to gift our friends and family this holiday season? The stress is overwhelming! Thankfully, this game gives a way to simulate their reactions to different kinds of gifts. I should probably mention that the simulation works best if you happen to be friends with bunnies, kittens and puppies!

games.author: Shady
games.description: Do you remember playing the old good snake on Nokie 3310? Why not remind yourself of the good old times with a sick 3D gameboard and more timing involved?

games.author: captaingoosehead
games.description: In the age of COVID-19, the classic yuletide tradition of door-to-door caroling may prove unsafe. Instead, stay home and fill this Christmas-music-shaped void in your soul by kicking out the jams with Charles Entertainment Cheese himself.

games.author: Anonymous
games.description: One of the many games in the semi-popular Super Brawl series. With 22 characters and 22 stages, it's one of the biggest games in the series.

games.author: coolman
games.description: An excellent and original concept : A fighting-puzzle game hybrid where you need to do a looping combo with the moves given to you. Really well made and with multiple difficulties to test your skills and logic.

games.author: RB
games.description: The most prominent Flashpoint meme of all time: Zuma. Though keep in mind this isn't the official winter version of Zuma. Still a good-looking Christmas/Winter themed marble popper game though

games.author: Filmkiller94
games.description: This is a pretty short but fun little Cartoon Network Beat 'Em Up game released in Late-2011. With great music and short but good gameplay it makes for a pretty good game to kill 10 minutes

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: A simple yet addictive launching game, with a fun art style, similar to Ezones other games. Simply fling the turkey as far as possible, and get some charming festive landings.

games.author: Greett
games.description: Christmas town has been taken over by evil monsters and it's your job to stop them. You play as Santa, wielding a gun and being the last line of defence against the beasts. Walk around in the 3d world, shoot the arsonist monsters and protect Christmas!

games.author: coolman
games.description: The best way to describethat game is that it is a driving-platformer hybrid. You must get to the end of different offroad levels, collecting collectibles and unlocking cars. This game is also pretty long, 60 levels + them in mirror mode afterwards. The game also got a more complete paid release on Steam.

games.author: Anonymous
games.description: One of the first games to come out from CartoonNetwork.com, with graphics that look quite faithful to the source material. What a pioneer!

games.author: Anonymous
games.description: Predating Achievement Unlocked by 6 months and with 110 achievements, this is one of the earliest games cantered around achievement hunting that I can remember. The graphics are rather crude, the gameplay is a little clunky, but there's a certain charm to the enemy design especially that gives it a special place in my heart.

games.author: RB
games.description: Another Bowling game with a twist. Unlike other bowling games where you watch the outcome, you have full control with this one, which means you can make your ball go whatever the heck you want. This game has rich history and potential, not gonna explain it because I don't want this description to be to long (You can watch ArtisIan's video about that). This game has a flash version, but I selected the Unity version because it has more lanes, including the snowy setting for the winter season.

games.author: Anonymous
games.description: Your objective? Scare the young girl. Your items? 6 items. Your maximum? 4 items. What monster will you receive?

games.author: Anonymous
games.description: Save The Sheriff, but with a Christmas theme and new unique levels. A challenging, but rewarding 2D platformer.

games.author: 9sven6
games.description: For me, this game was the first web game with a story more impactful then go save the princess, and has lived rent free in my head for nearly a decade now.

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: This is a classic Christmastide game from Miniclip that's similar to Line Rider. In this game, you must help Santa reach his end destination. To help him, you must draw a line from the starting point to the end point. Along the way, you must overcome challenges, and collect presents to rack up points.

games.author: Revac
games.description: Santa is behind on his Christmas preparations, and he's only got one minute to make it to his toy factory! Platform through 8 short levels all within 60 seconds to get to the factory and save Christmas!

games.author: RB
games.description: You can't talk about flash games without Papa Louie, one of the prominent Flash figures :P. Enter Papa's Cupcakeria, one of the installments in the Gameria series with a snowy setting for the Winter season

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: Clickamajigs from Nickelodeon are best known for their simplistic and humorous nature. In this Clickamajig, there's humor, if you can even call it humor. Since this Billy guy sucks at jokes, why not show how you feel about them? You can throw stuff like bowling balls, watermelons, pies, and all sorts of silly objects.

games.author: RB
games.description: This is just plain weird. I remember playing this game when I was a kid. It feels like a fever dream. I do not know what's going on with the developer's mind while doing this

games.author: Filmkiller94
games.description: Sienna Reverse Racer was a very limited game on Shockwave.com and made by Silent Bay Studios in 2010 April, Perhaps a pretty good unusual hidden gem of a Shockwave game with it's fun gameplay and nice music and shortness to it.

games.author: Anonymous
games.description: Not necessarily a Christmas game, but still a winter-themed classic. Throw snowballs at the snowmen but don't get caught. If you run out of energy, it's game over. How far can you get?

games.author: Dri0m
games.description: It's the Dark Souls of the tower defense genre.

games.author: Tallamar
games.description: The Flash game equivalent of comfort food; a cute and relatively short vertical Launch game. Also the reason I learned to curate.

games.author: Rocko Rotten (ItsTheLazytown)
games.description: In 2007, Nickelodeon's Super Stuffed Nicksgiving marathons aired. The most important marathon during the Nicksgiving weekend was when they showed the first episode of every Nicktoon at the time. To tie in to this hyped marathon, Sarbakan developed this game for Nickelodeon. In this game, you have to complete tasks in a short amount of time, much like WarioWare. Put together Aang's glider, catch some ghosts, and serve up a krabby patty! Be careful, if you make one mistake, you lose a life! The longer you succeed, the more points you get.

games.author: prostagma
games.description: Fun Metroidvania. The final boss OST got stuck in my younger self's brain back then.

games.author: prostagma
games.description: Out of all Match-3 games in Flashpoint, I did not expect to get addicted at a promotional one.

games.author: Walker21232123
games.description:
a Garfield 
table tennis/ping pong game sponsored by Petshealth Care Plan.

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: this game is excellent in question of graphics and good history.Also,you can customize your character and have a better weapon for combat!

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: Create an incredible story by drawing characters and choosing their actions. After that just watch as the madness unfolds.

games.author: Samsonator
games.description: An innovative tie-in game that pushes the limits of Flash's graphical capabilities.

games.author: BlueMaxima
games.description: A silly choose-your-own-adventure filled with charm, endings and ducks.

games.author: JustNóri
games.description: The best 2D shooter I've ever played. So nostalgic and so much fun to come back to anytime. It really blessed my days of early internet games. Good story, good replayability, awesome soundtrack, and most of all: action-packed gameplay.

games.author: Miri
games.description: We all know that Raze 2  is the real winner here

games.author: CursedLight
games.description: Robotic Emergence and its sequel are great little strategy games where you need to think about the placement of your factories in order to produce enough robots to crush your enemy.

games.author: irsY
games.description: Great platform game with awesome music. Gives me nostalgia everytime I play it.

games.author: R.E.W
games.description: Fun Platformer with awesome music and epic cutscenes! The first one made me cry :(

games.author: LavAriz
games.description:
A 2D physics puzzle-platformer where the player uses special paints (Kinda like Portal Gels) to travel across a factory after an incident has occurred during a party.

The soundtrack is catchy and the art style has a paper-like vector art.

games.author: Rocko Rotten (ItsTheLazytown)
games.description: The Mortimer Beckett games were my favorite GameHouse games growing up. They are hidden objects games with puzzle elements. This one, Mortimer Beckett and the Time Paradox, was my favorite of the franchise. In this game, you go through various periods in history, like the Viking ages. The one in Flashpoint is the trial version, meaning that you can only play the first level. If you like this game so much and want to experience the full game, you can purchase it, or get a GameHouse membership. I personally recommend playing through the series at least once, it's an adventure you will not regret. This demo will give you a good sense of the franchise.

games.author: Renegát
games.description: One of the best games in the "Papa's" series isn't even named "Papa's" (at least until Mr. Louie expands into the arms industry). A Flipline classic with forging, medieval weapons and adventure for unique treasures.

games.author: Dukktape
games.description: A cute puzzle game with spiders that is unexpectedly fun to play.

games.author: TheGTAGamer5000
games.description: A nice nostalgic game. I used to play it, it was on YouTube on some point, this is practically what introduced me to the internet.

games.author: MeleeWaluigi
games.description: A classic fighting game where you can play as many Naruto and Bleach characters. Very easy to pick up but has a surprising amount of depth for a flash game.

games.author: Ailuas816
games.description: She loves the holidays and wants to look totally fab on Christmas Day. What should she wear?

games.author: Dukktape
games.description: A personality quiz to answer one of life's most important questions.

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: One of the most nostalgic flash game i played when kid. A good parody of Pacman with different story and redesign

games.author: blandes02
games.description: This shows as the perfect example of how to make a huge microsite based on a show. This contains lots of Super Why! games! But here are the gems I would recommend: Super Why’s Storybook Creator, Attack of the Eraser, Woofter’s Journey to the Golden Bone, and Super Why’s WhyFlyer Adventure! Produced by PBS Kids, will make you never bored!

games.author: blandes02
games.description: Another one of my childhood microsites. In this microsite, you can play 14 Curious George games in one, such as, High Five, Flower Garden, Monkey Jump, and Bubble Pop. Just like the rest of Curious George games, you can’t help but play it for a while.

games.author: PapaLouieFan2023
games.description: Score from long distance to make extra points

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: This game is the most creative rpg such as good references and different types of fight!

games.author: Revac
games.description: Stack towers of crystals in this addicting arcade game loosely based on Pokémon. Be careful though, one wrong move and you lose your entire tower!

games.author: CursedLight
games.description: Fun little game where you build and upgrade attractions in an amusement park to make money and happy visitors in a limited amount of time.

games.author: Rocko Rotten (ItsTheLazytown)
games.description: In this game, you can play three minigames, Knock down the tubes, catch the rat, and hoopla. Your goal is to get 10/10 points before the time runs out. You can play as one of the four Tweenies, Bella, Milo, Jake, or Fizz. If you complete the minigame, you are awarded with pintables. It's a very simple game. Despite being simplistic, if you grew up watching Tweenies, you are sure to get a dose of nostalgia.

games.author: Dukktape
games.description: One of my childhood favourite games. I played the browser based demo probably hundreds of times. Still looking for a copy of the full game as they are surprisingly hard to find.

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: A simple but fun puzzle game, just shoot the fuzz balls to paint the same color boxes! Features great music and it's been a personal favorite for years.

games.author: TheGTAGamer5000
games.description: This is a very funny biking game. I like how the guy spins around when he gets sucked into the tornado.

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: This game is a underrated gem and my favorite. Has a surreal story,cool mechanics in style of Matrix and good difficulty

games.author: Greett
games.description: A unique defense game with a charming 3D artstyle. Defend your mushrooms by any means necessary, using everything from miniguns to fly swatters. Don't worry, no animals get harmed! I think...

games.author: Greett
games.description: An alchemy game with a cute artstyle and a world to fill with your creations! Can you collect all the combinations of animals, plants, objects and even monsters? This may take a while, because the game offers over 200 items to alchemise!

games.author: testunstop
games.description: fun game about not doing you're work

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: Fun game which you can help a octopus for go into water tank! lol

games.author: Greett
games.description: Everyone loves winning a game, and in this game you can do it over 20 times! Try aiming for 3 stars in each level. Perfecting some levels may be a headache, or maybe I'm just bad at slidey puzzles.

games.author: Rocko Rotten (ItsTheLazytown)
games.description: Ever wanted to go to Walt Disney World, but the high prices are steering you away? This VRML world has you covered! Well, kinda. Here, you can explore Magic Kingdom, EPCOT, and Hollywood Studios (then called Disney-MGM Studios) as they appeared in 2001. Sorry Animal Kingdom fans, but your park isn't here despite existing back then :(. If you wanted to know what the parks were like back then, here you go. Reminisce the time when Snow White's Scary Adventures existed before the space was turned into a crummy meet and greet they could've placed anywhere else in the park. You can also reminisce the time where the parks looked straight out of an early Roblox game. Okay, that last part isn't true lol

games.author: RB
games.description: Pool game with a twist. The table is round, you have the full control of the stick, the balls act ...a little odd, powerups, and some banger music. Made by the same guy who created Neverending Light and Platform Racing 2

games.author: Dukktape
games.description: While not a particularly unique or interesting game, this game had the honor of being the 100,000th game added to Flashpoint. Who knows what will be the game to hit the 200k milestone?

games.author: Luvexina
games.description: Place your shapes strategically in order to capture your opponent's pieces.

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: Excellent fighting game and is good for make chaos with bots

games.author: Rocko Rotten (ItsTheLazytown)
games.description: So you liked Mortimer Beckett and the Time Paradox? This follow-up is for you. It improves the previous game's graphics and mechanics. If you like it, you can subscribe to GameHouse or purchase the full game.

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: a good activeX game for train your brain

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: Truly classic flash game

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: Ever wanted to date Cambrian creatures...no? here ya go. Answer their questions correctly to win their hearts!

games.author: Rocko Rotten (ItsTheLazytown)
games.description:
This was the first ever curation I did. This was what started my involvement with Flashpoint. It all started when I realized that half of the Pauly's Playhouse games were missing from Flashpoint.   This bothered me, so I decided to curate the remaining games myself. With the remaining Pauly's Playhouse games curated, I felt much better. Originally, I had no interest in curating anything other than those games, but I kept coming across other stuff to curate that captured my interest. Once I had curated a handful of games, I became staff. Today, I still enjoy curating, it's my favorite thing to do for Flashpoint.

This game is a match-3 puzzle game from Pauly's Playhouse. There's not a whole lot to it, but it can be addicting.

games.author: Rocko Rotten (ItsTheLazytown)
games.description:
This game may not seem like anything special, but this one was a very important curation for me. This curation was the first ever audition I have checked. Today, I'm known for checking people's auditions, this is what started it all. Even more special, the person who auditioned with this, Bluecake, ended up becoming staff.

This game is a winter-themed scene creator from Knowledge Adventure. There's really not much to say about this game, but it's kinda cute.

games.author: Filmkiller94
games.description: Another hidden gem in Nickelodeon's Flash games (Even if it has a grotesque premise lol) The premise is pretty weird but it makes for a fun game which keeps you entertained.

games.author: Filmkiller94
games.description: This game is a hidden gem in Nickelodeon's Flash games. With big level design with simple combat and a pretty decent soundtrack, this definitely earns a spot.

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: A genuinely really pretty VRML world. Relax in this small town from Spain and take a walk on the beach.

games.author: Rocko Rotten (ItsTheLazytown)
games.description: Ever wanted to play a weird dream you had last night? Here you go! This is the only known surviving Play3D title.

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: Just plain fun Tetris! Really solid controls and really addicting to aim for a high score.

games.author: AnthonyAnimate
games.description: This Uno game really hits it out of the park. It is almost like your playing in real life. So much so that they even shout Uno.

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: It is a version of the most famous mobile game of all times.Excellent gameplay,sound effects and songs.

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: Best game for one of the greatest shows of all time

games.author: Dukktape
games.description: It's an Among Us clone with suspicious cats. What's not to like?

games.author: SorryButNoName
games.description: Cool 3D flying disc game for a soda drink.

games.author: Binzy_Boi
games.description: The single most touching thing I've seen while curating, this animation was made by Vividchan the day of her dog's passing, and serves as a tribute to her life.

games.author: Revac
games.description: Observe the Rei cube.

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: A silly little trivia game. Shake your head yes or no to the random questions, and truly be a big brain!

games.author: Revac
games.description: Originally developed as an advergame for Lineage II, this puzzle-adventure game is a hidden gem within On Nakayama's works.

games.author: tytheguy
games.description: A classic flash game, launched in 2007, is a fun games with pizza!

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: Help this beautiful man surf. Drag your mouse around and keep him afloat

games.author: Captninja6
games.description: Henry Stickmin has always been my favorite webgame series. The amount of choice and funny references is pretty cool. Fleeing The Complex is the biggest Henry Stickmin game on Flashpoint, and it's pretty good

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: Play with the funny ant thing and make her dance! :D

games.author: Revac
games.description: Rediscover betrayal and heartbreak with the most infamous cat themed Mario game (sorry 3D World.)

games.author: Revac
games.description: A great mobile-friendly (so simple controls!) metroidvania platformer. Don't let the potential language barrier scare you!

games.author: Revac
games.description: A fun physics based puzzle-platformer. No relation to Matthew Jamieson's great Circlo puzzle games, unfortunately.

games.author: Revac
games.description: Enjoy the 360 degree marble popper thrill of Circlo.

games.author: R.E.W
games.description: a cute little Strawberry Shortcake dance memory game! :D

games.author: gardenofraven
games.description: Find the hidden object and descend further in this trippy puzzle game.

games.author: Revac
games.description: Explore a hidden world within an incomplete game.

games.author: Captninja6
games.description: A run and gun platformer with a boss after every level

games.author: Revac
games.description: A dark defense game from jmtb02.

games.author: jlgd
games.description: drive as fast as you can and upgrade your car

games.author: ddnikki
games.description: Learn to Fly, but with a ha... flying squirrel, who has to prove his squirrelness by flying himself to a party.

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: This is addicting game. Will you have patience for complete all of them?

games.author: airheadz.
games.description: A great game, from a great series of animations, that spawned an EVEN GREATER sequel!

games.author: wrap
games.description: The first game in the Harry the Hamster series. Simple yet addicting.

games.author: Filmkiller94
games.description: One of my favorite games that was released late by Silent Bay. So good I always sometimes come back to this one because of it's fast paced action shooting gameplay.

games.author: Rocko Rotten (ItsTheLazytown)
games.description: You play as a clown, walking around a circus tent. That's the whole game. Also, that clown looks like they have some problems going on.

games.author: prostagma
games.description: A roguelike with nice graphics and enough complexity to play for hours.

games.author: Revac
games.description: Master the platforms and parachute, and enjoy the great soundtrack of Rock 'n' Risk.

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: An addicting puzzle game with a relaxing environment. Chill with the tropical music and satisficing puzzle clicking.

games.author: Revac
games.description: An offline port of a defunct online platformer. Comes with the entire officially made campaign, and has support to load custom levels. (Read the notes!)

games.author: Revac
games.description: 2010s electronic music meets The Legend Of Zelda.

games.author: blandes02
games.description: To celebrate 2 years of me being a curator, I’m gotta post my curations as Game of the Day! That’s right! We’re not going to stop until everything has been covered! First is Birdly Bicycle. This is the one that started all! Back then when I was a child, I used to play a lot of Angry Birds fan games, and hoo boy, this is so cute! I curated this game because I realized a lot of Angry Birds games are not available on Flashpoint. In this game, you be Red, in a bicycle. This game is not much but this is what comes this to be the best day of my life because I can save a lot of Angry Birds games. You’ll love to see it!

games.author: Revac
games.description:
Play two levels of 
Terry Cavanagh's classic gravity-switching platformer. Included as Alt Apps are two early prototypes!

games.author: ddnikki
games.description: A "catch stuff from the sky game" that was apparently unforgettable because I was trying to look for this game since I was like 9. (I don't know why or how I remembered this much.)

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: Literally a game saying that isnt game

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: Really good game with cool modeling clay characters

games.author: ddnikki
games.description: One of the best Mario games I've seen. Proven by how I almost spent an entire day straight playing this.

games.author: RB
games.description: With the release of The Super Mario Bros. Movie, here is Chris Pratt voicing Mario in Super Mario Bros. for the NES.

games.author: Filmkiller94
games.description:
Childhood.
Anyways this is a pretty good Beat em Up game with pretty good 3D Graphics

games.author: gardenofraven
games.description: Celebrate the Fourth of July by playing as Flash developers' favorite president to make games about.

games.author: AniArtistMe
games.description:
Strike Force Heroes is a 2012 Side Shooter Platformer, 4 Classes over 50+ Weapons, Skills, Killstreaks and more.

30 Missions a fun Custom Game, and even sneaky yet funny Achievements you can get in game.

games.author: discorduser2000
games.description: Celebrate the most underrated animator's (Nothing can top him.) 58th birthday in July 7 by playing this game.

games.author: al_2713
games.description: Simply play with the dog, and give him a bone! A fun little toy, and one of the cutest examples of the Tcl programing language.

games.author: sneaky_zucchini
games.description: This stickman point-n-click adventure will have you sitting there with your chin resting on the knuckles of your hand. Click the things in the right order to get this balloon off the ground.

games.author: miguel2000.swf
games.description: Go feed this cute cat

games.author: r.e.w
games.description: a retro puzzle platformer, switch and mix to the right colors to avoid obstacles and get to the portal.

games.author: it_me_cheesey
games.description: Look through the eyes a creature seeing the world for the first time in this Flash classic.

games.author: .nyehmeh
games.description: The best baseball game in Futuria! You're sure to hit a home run (almost) every time. (Protip: Try hitting the ball into background objects)

games.author: princerandy
games.description: An adorable and unique shooter in Jimp's art style. Play as the iconic blue elephant and raid a train while nabbing some major loot.

games.author: miguel2000.swf
games.description: Crazy billiards game

games.author: r.e.w
games.description: The first part of a series korean stick platformer games, having creative puzzle obstacles for you to solve

games.author: smoresally_7416
games.description: My most-played game to date. Ideal for a quick 5 min session. High score to beat: 29,000. I'm sure you'll do fine.

games.author: captninja6
games.description: The classic mobile game. If you somehow don't know what this game is it's basically endless Frogger

games.author: princerandy
games.description: A guilt-free anarchist game. Take over the world with mutated plant monsters.

games.author: dukktape
games.description: A 3D puzzle game with good vibes.

games.author: Renegát
games.description: You know first-person and third-person games, but what a second-person perspective could be? In this shooter you get the answer: you see yourself through the eyes of the enemy! Use their view as an advantage, but watch out for their unique quirks, and don't get dizzy!

games.author: it_me_cheesey
games.description: When the mermaid is trans allegory. (Very shocking, never seen before, unimaginable.)

games.author: 05Distortion
games.description: This game was used to teach math by teachers in many classrooms in the United Kingdom years ago, regardless of age. Despite its educational nature, it has a lot of variety and content, from boss fights involving math questions to several minigames that aren't educational at all. The game also has a lot of personality with its art and characters, and all these factors combined make for a surprisingly fun and expansive educational game in the end.

games.author: sneaky_zucchini
games.description: A surprisingly addictive game. You control a red dragon, and your objective is to shoot down aything in your path. Enemies vary in strenght and endurance, so you need to select the breath ability to use wisely, without also running out. This game can go on forever.

games.author: ._interface_.
games.description: A short, calm game where you color the world around you. No enemies, no action, just platforming!

games.author: miguel2000.swf
games.description: angry birds but with cows lol

games.author: liblung
games.description: A novel take on the lane defense genre where you must defend from your opponent, and simultaneously overcome his defenses.

games.author: cezarr
games.description: A time management game where you have to create the best honey farm as you can. Kinda addictive.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: Cute little game in which you have to solve mini puzzles in order to get the people of the Tube.

games.author: captninja6
games.description: A 2D platformer where you control 2 characters, each with their own level

games.author: dukktape
games.description: A beautiful little game made in the best plugin. Originally made as a Ludum Dare entry.

games.author: sheeshfutt
games.description: How Amanita Design began. Playing this and their subsequent games as a kid was absolutely magical, probably the reason I'm into gaming today.

games.author: princerandy
games.description: Play as a heartless, profit-chasing oil industry kingpin. Decimate landscapes, bribe politicians, spread propaganda and annihilate ecosystems- all in the name of black gold!!

games.author: smoresally_7416
games.description: Jam-packed with content. About 100 (mini-)shows or so. The classic YDKJ you know and love (or hate. or love to hate).

games.author: piratebrasil1
games.description: Megaman but with newgrounds mascot!

games.author: princerandy
games.description: Manage your own cell and guard against viruses in this educational cell defence game.

games.author: sneaky_zucchini

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: Has good depressing story

games.author: sneaky_zucchini

games.author: r.e.w
games.description: A cute little platformer about a smiley trying to fix a portal system

games.author: princerandy

games.author: it_me_cheesey

games.author: miguel2000.swf
games.description: Relaxing physics game

games.author: sneaky_zucchini
games.description: Navigate the groovy mirror ball trough this disco maze while listening to some radical looping hits. You need to get to the goal of the level, monkey-ball style while earning points and pick up some smoking chicks along the way.

games.author: sneaky_zucchini

games.author: greatfunk

games.author: sneaky_zucchini

These living plushies have been abused by their owners, and its up to you to deeply analyze their mind and get to the root of how to help them with their mental problems. You need to make sure you pick the right therapeutic methods in order to help them heal, or you risk doing more damage to their mentality and send them spiraling, or worse.

games.author: sneaky_zucchini

But dont knock him too many times, or he is going to get a sugar rush and bounce all over the place, which is sad. Balance the fun out with proper naps. You only have limited naps, so use them wisely.

games.author: phoenix_05

games.author: gapplepotato

It is the best monster breeding RPG.
My favorite monster is "バードマン"

games.author: walker21232123

Don't you worry, they made an English version. The English version is coming soon to a database near you.

games.author: Revac

Crabs are cool.

Monkey Island was always huge, so it comes to no surprise that around 2004 onwards, this famous argentinian web animations had a special parody game. Later, Alejo y Valentina were aired on MTV and other channels for a couple of years.

Only argentinian spanish though, si no entienden esto, a casa petes!
