games.description: A awesome runner game in different countrys

games.author: Cezarr
games.description:
mayonnaise
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cN9Xhtb345w

games.author: BallRevampedFanboi
games.description: A cute platformer puzzle game, where the game bends it's own rules for you to solve, plus a suprise at the end ;)

games.author: Alej2006
games.description: The best SpongeBob Flash game that released in 2008 that i recommend it

games.author: Arges
games.description: Crazy Zombie 9.0 is the last game in the series. A great beat 'em up featuring playable characters from anime, games and movies.

games.author: Cezarr
games.description: A fun platformer, but not for people with arachnophobia

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Get with the rhythm and graze as many obstacles as you can to power up your shots! Plenty of levels and catchy background music make this easy to pick up and play.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Remove as many building blocks and shapes as you can while preventing the entire structure from falling down.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Spell the words with "ten" in them using only letter tiles and an image as clues.

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: Happy St. Patrick's Day! For the occasion, here's a fun little game to help you understand some Irish.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: It's time to kick Odie off the table! You have five rounds to make him go as far as you can.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Play minigames and learn about Internet safety in this Google-developed 3D world.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Glowmonkey uses an ever-growing variety of weapons to defeat a stickman virus infecting your computer!

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Dive into the depths of the ocean to get treasure and buy upgrades.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Put yourself in Jim Davis's shoes and make the Garfield comics of your dreams.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Use your business sense and/or mining skills to succeed in this educational simulation of 1840s California.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Arrange different tools on a grid to send an electric circuit to the end. It's deceptively tricky!

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Design and pilot your own Robot ROVER to help Ruff Ruffman collect whatever he needs for his show.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Angle the lights to shine on the disco ball. Disco parties included after every puzzle.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Find the optimal routes to deliver use cream around town before it melts.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: This favorite of YTPers spawned the Hungry Pumkin meme we all know and love.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: This particularly impressive RPG is jam-packed with content, difficult battles, an engaging storyline, hidden collectibles, a full chiptune soundtrack, and 25-30 hours of content.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Steal as many of the items on your list before the owner comes home! Perfectly spooky.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Take a virtual trip to the monument of Stonehenge.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: Touhou meets Bloons in this free-flying shoot 'em up, full of difficult levels and powerful upgrades.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: A simple yet addictive 3D flyer where you dodge obstacles at an ever-increasing speed.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: A cute little rhythm game. Use the right keys to the drum with the beat of the music.

games.author: Scrooge200
games.description: A brief, comedic, and dialogue-less HTML5 puzzler has you help this co-worker with fixing his printer.

games.author: Sheeshfutt
games.description: As a kid obsessed with Amanita Design, I used to hate this game because it was just trivia, and I could never get past the first level. Trying it again a decade and a half later, finishing Questionaut is a breeze, and is highly worth it for it's Samorost 2 - Machinarium era artstyle and music.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: Back in 2001, this animation was viral. Everyone was sharing it by email, ICQ, IRC and even floppy disks. A relatively obscure Sega Genesis game released almost a decade before, was suddenly in the spotlight.

games.author: Cats4life
games.description: In this short game, you must help Alejandro cross the freezing Yukon water in order to get his stolen belongings.

games.author: jray4559
games.description: One man, thousands of dead, loot-laden zombies. What more could you ask for?

games.author: miguel2000
games.description: Impressive doom style game which really addictive and fun for people who like shooting games

games.author: RB
games.description: Watermelon Game is a game where you match circles in order to make a bigger one. If the circles reach the top then it's game over. It's just a simple game, totally wouldn't change your life forever :P. Also, don't forget to check the notes before playing.

games.author: Raven
games.description: That's Numberwang!

games.author: zel (dont ping)
games.description: a game i literally stumbled on randomly a few months ago, and it quickly became one of my most-played games. you match the color of your group of gems to match any adjacent gems in order to add them to your group, and you try to get more gems than your opponent. this is fun and surprisingly addictive, also the music is awesome !

games.author: childishbeat
games.description: Jump around a circus stage and paint more blocks than your opponent while getting cool bonuses for drawing horizontal or vertical lines across the board, or alternatively a 9x9 square in the corner. Collect the balloons to get powerups, but be careful not to pick the bad ones! See how far you can get without getting beat.

games.author: P-Tux7
games.description: A psychedelic kaleidoscope of sight and sound.

games.author: DailyKosia
games.description: A point and click featuring bear agents evolving into a plot of fight against the evil spirit of Christmas in an alternate reality.

games.author: DailyKosia
games.description: This is the famous game, released 20 years ago on March 4, 2004, which popularised the escape the room genre.

games.author: TestTubeFan
games.description: This game is like You Only Live One, but if it was serious. Probably one of the most depressing flash games ever made.

games.author: zel (dont ping)
games.description: its basically pinball but you just control the ball itself with a limited number of launches that you can refill if you get lucky, and you try to hit the bell at the top. its actually rather exhilarating! as a gamevial game its also filled with the trademark Vibes, i love how it looks even despite being really heavy on motion blur

games.author: zel (dont ping)
games.description: a bit clunky and youll need to look at the tutorial first, but this is a very neat little creature creator! if you make anything show it in the server's game of the day channel

games.author: Gapple
games.description: A pixel action game with great graphics and music.

games.author: Arges
games.description: In this puzzle platformer, Anski and Blip both have different strengths and weaknesses, your goal is to switch between the two to solve puzzles and find their lost pets!

games.author: SᗰTᗯOᖇᒪᗪᗩᖇT!
games.description: Pucca runs a noodle restaurant in this game. Make sure to attend to everyone and hit all the ninjas that try to steal the noodles!

games.author: Super
games.description: A minimalist puzzle game where you need to make the entire screen yellow.  Very relaxing!

games.author: Cheesey
games.description: Blast these little oval creatures to the exits! (Best enjoyed while brushing off classwork in your school library.)

games.author: Cheesey
games.description: Show off your sick guitar (computer keyboard) skills while listening to some great garage band music. Totes guaranteed to make all the cuties fall for you.

games.author: Alej2006
games.description: angry birds but it's spongebob

games.author: Litness11
games.description:
"No one has ever escaped from Alcatraz. And no one ever will..."
But, with perseverance you could be the first! Try your luck in this game that is nearly faithful to the movie of the same name, and see if you can escape from Alcatraz! (all pun intended)

games.author: Gapple
games.description: This is an RPG that was released in 2002 and gained popularity.

games.author: balik
games.description: Use your teleportation ability to dodge missiles and complete levels in this brutally difficult platformer.

games.author: Cheesey
games.description: Make your own minimalist html game, with Bitsy! A fun and easy tool for newbies. If you do, share it on our Discord for everyone to enjoy!

games.author: CREWminal
games.description: A cute little puzzle platformer about your character Pee Wee and your dog Nits discovering the various places in history.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A flash version of the popular Portal series! Over 40 test chambers to complete, and Valve even used some levels for the exclusive Xbox Live Arcade game.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: An RPG/stats-based game where you build up your Newgrounds profile in hopes of becoming a top portal artist, a mod, or even an admin!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A classic run and shoot game where you must fight the FBI, created by the founder of Newgrounds!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: The best game in the Ball Revamped series in my opinion. It includes a level editor and achievements!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: Interact with your buddy in so many ways and earn money to unlock new features for further interaction!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A game made before Plague Inc. Make your virus powerful and cause human extinction!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: The World's Hardest Game. Think you can beat it? It even came with 3 sequels.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: The World's Hardest Game, but it's a mouse avoider.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: An updated version of the classic Pong game. It is the third most-viewed Newgrounds submission of all time, just behind SimGirls and Friday Night Funkin'.

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: Here's a bizarre platformer based on Brazilian folklore where you play as this wish.com looking Pac-Man guy (Pequito). Set in the Pampas of Rio Grande do Sul, you mostly collect items scattered all over the map among other quests. According to the original description, what you're seeing is the first part of the game. Unfortunately, due to lack of funds, the game was never completed. However, the game still offers an interesting experience.

games.author: Pink Bunny
games.description: A game that is inspired by old-school point and click adventure games. What's interesting is that the characters and quests are modeled after real-life professionals and professors working at Tembusu College, National University of Singapore and the research that they do. Also its art style and tone gives it a unique mysterious atmosphere.

games.author: RB
games.description: Suco Polar (translation:  Polar Juice) is a game where you play as a polar bear who is competing against a panda in a juice drinking competition. The panda gets faster each flavor/level.

games.author: RB
games.description: Similar to Suco Polar, but you get to choose a character and not only it's a drinking competition, it's also an eating competition.

games.author: RB
games.description: Perfect Fart is a game where your character has to fart for exactly 5 seconds. You can't cross beyond to a millisecond, it has to be exactly 5 seconds. This game is my first ever curation in Flashpoint.

games.author: square_nine
games.description:
An interesting turn-based combat game which some might be too ready to call a pokemon knockoff. But, it contains much less of the exploring and focuses more on the diversity of the "minions" you can add to your team, which can lead to the enjoyment of team-building as well as a lightweight turn-based combat not unlike Pokemon.

It is definetely worth a try!

(p.s there is a subreddit for this game as well!)

games.author: tinkertailor0
games.description: Engaging platformer tie-in to the BBC's  Sarah Jane Adventures series. Draw in platforms and solve puzzles to guide yourself to safety!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A simple looking platformer that's actually brutally tough. Collecting every coin in each level won't be easy...

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A unique puzzle-platforming game where you play as Roy who can change into 3 different colors and avoid any black goo that kills you. This is one of my favorite Flash games.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: This game may seem simple, but it's hard. You must be very precise as you press the Space bar, and you will die, a lot.

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: A game where you need to hit your piggy bank to earn cash and buy upgrades.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A mouse avoider game that claims to be better than others of this genre at the time. It includes custom cursors, a health bar, and a level editor! Share your levels on the Flashpoint Discord server!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: If you know Mr. Driller, this is basically a Flash version of this arcade game. Reach the bottom while collecting air capsules to replenish your depleting oxygen. Oh, the nostalgia.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: You play as a ninja who must collect gold to survive while avoiding robots who are out to kill you in each level. This is a very fun and nostalgic game.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A fun physics game where you must destroy the castle in each level. It influenced a certain franchise that started out on mobile phones with a similar premise.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A physics-puzzle game where you must bring your blue gemstone to the exit in each level and make it out of the cave alive.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: Toss your ball into the pit and use magnets to move it. It uses pre-Mac OS X backgrounds and a sequel!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: Draw on the level however you like then guide your character safely to the flag without dying. Also came with 2 sequels.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A simple game where you must toss your fireballs to light up all the torches. Think you can get all Aces in every level? It also has a sequel.

games.author: Cezarr
games.description: Game from the classic platformer series that was one of the defining titles of the Flash gaming era

games.author: Arges
games.description: This is an completely unique, experimental game... or should we say non-game.

games.author: prostagma
games.description: A clever twist in Tetris that mixes it with Pipe Connector games.

games.author: roshank
games.description:
An addictive but simple flash where you try to throw your plane as far as you can to cover the most distance, you can get upgraded as you go to extend this distance and have some really satisfying scores if you get lucky!

Has a story element as you go from place to place.

games.author: roshank
games.description:
"Dogfight" is a cool flash game where you get to pilot a WWI plane and take on enemy fighters. Simple to play but with enough strategy to keep it interesting.

The levels get progressively harder and you rely more and more on your on tactics to stop getting downed, super fun!

games.author: roshank
games.description:
This is a relatively challenging Hoop shooting game vs an AI opponent, you have to land a trick shot and the opponent has to copy, if they fail you get a point, if you fail to replicate they do!

See if you can beat all challengers to win, played the game since i was a kid and was never able to get even close to winning, but its really fun to land combo trick shots!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: Unreal Flash 2007 is part of a popular Unreal Flash series that allows you to play over 50 playable characters, has different game modes and also a story where you compete to become the champion! This is a really fun game!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A rather simple mouse avoider game that has few levels, which also includes the old Armor Games intro and music that reminds you of the good old days.

games.author: roshank
games.description:
An extremely simple 'experimental' type game, You Literally control the road, your only goal is to screw over the drivers how ever you feel like, the road is formed as you move the camera, and you can left click to place down object and send cars flying to their doom!

The entire time you get a read-out of the cards and their emotions its stupid but for some reason really satisfying.

games.author: RoyBoy
games.description: Knighttron is a neat RPG flash game with great story and characters and PHENOMENAL music, made by the creator of the popular Zombotron. It's steam-level stuff. I think this one is a must-play for any flash game enthusiast.

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Find enough gramatical mistaekes in studnets' essays to fail them and and get out of your own student debt!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: A serene beat-em-up game with a unique combo system. Dash into the enemies, jump and perform a combo with effects ranging from healing yourself to casting a laser beam. You also play as a very squeaky fox!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: A platformer with a cozy hand-drawn look. Your cursor is a separate "character" able to shape shift into different platforms to aid you parkour over the obstacles. Both characters must reach the end using (and abusing) each other's unique capabilities.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: Defend your desktop from creeps in this fun and addictive tower defense game! The original version is also available if you prefer that version.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: Defend your desktop from creeps in this fun and addictive tower defense game! There's also a 1.5 version available in the archive.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: You're just having a picnic on a nice and peaceful day, until the ants showed up! Build turrets and upgrade them to defend your cake from those greedy ants!

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: A physics-puzzle game with an infamous concept of stacking a complete tower of blocks without any of them falling to the bottomless pit. Think you can beat over 80 trials?

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: Click, drag, and type your way to solve each puzzles in this game! 10 levels from previous installments are also included, bringing a total of 15 levels to complete.

games.author: Mudkip with Shades in a Scarf
games.description: The goal in this game is to cheat by copying the geek's answers while avoiding the sight of the teacher. Has stereotypes of every high school student you know!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: A test of your digital spacial awareness. Click as many targets as you can without being able to see your cursor. Just don't right click though...

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: A technically simple but poetically tear-jerkingly platformer where you must escape the mistakes of the past... or do you?

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Play as a kitty endlessly jumping from bubble to bubble in one of the most idyllic game worlds ever created.

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Your Super Mario! What does that mean? Jumping on koopas? NO! It means you gotta go beat up bowser and his underlings with your bare fists!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: A kingdom rush-like tower defense game having you fend off a myriad of nasty bugs from eating your sugar!

games.author: pinkbunny9595
games.description:
An interesting Fixed Shooter Game made by Pizza Hut Singapore. Back in the day, this game was members-only. 

As a side note, playing this game may make you crave for pizza.

games.author: pinkbunny9595
games.description: A simple but fun shockwave game that was made by the Republic of Singapore Air Force and released in the early 2000s.

games.author: Gapple
games.description:
Japanese anime with a core fan base celebrating its 50th anniversary this year
Fan-made game of “Chargeman Ken!”

「泉くん、たなびたい事があるんだちょっと」

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: A charming low-poly golf game making use of the freedom provided by video games to make the most absurd golf courses ever.

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Chuck the balls into their respective cups. This games sound design and physics injects raw opioids into my brain.

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: The demo of a simple but wonderful dark space shooter, manage your ship every level buying new crazy weapons, rockets or mini helper ships.

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: You are Tiny Square. Big Square has stolen your pineapple. Climb the endless tower in a hardcore platforming challenger and SAVE YOUR PINEAPPLE!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Big square is back at it again and he has escaped on his new massive ice tower. Get revenge for his transgressions in the previous game!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: The most mad racing game ever seen. Racing and physics are mere suggestions in this world. Race to win or destroy all the other racers!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Unsure if your gamepad works? Here is a fun toy to try it out on.

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: A deceptively easy arcade game. Bounce the ball of the wall for as long as you can dealing with any trick the game throws at you. Doubles as a rhythm/timing game if you close your eyes!

games.author: EvanPBanks
games.description: Twisted Metal meets Ed, Edd n Eddy, but with cartoonish weapons and powers.

games.author: EvanPBanks
games.description: The KND be ballin'

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: Here's a very fun obscure puzzle game in Java. In this game, you play as a mummy with the goal of getting the top piece of a pyramid to its final destination. Pay extra attention to every move you make, as paths can flip. There are over 100 levels to complete, with each of them having their own unique solutions.

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description:
An endless runner featuring Kizi where you try to get the highest score possible. You can also get powerups and upgrades. (the upgrades don't work unfortunately.)
You only need 2 keys to play it, Z & X.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: The first game in the TD series. Simple and fun. Don't miss all the sequels to check how this series started to build up.

games.author: DailyKosia
games.description: Little puzzle maze game to pass some minutes. You must obey traffic rules.

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: This is one of the most famous Mario fan games. Not only that, but it's the best too. It's much like a classic Mario platformer, but with a few twists. The biggest twist is the inclusion of F.L.U.U.D., which adds a whole new level of excitement. Getting sick of the main game? Why not try out the level editor! Feel free to share your creations in the #game-of-the-day channel.

games.author: childishbeat
games.description: Mario and his palette-swapped friends have swapped karts for shopping carts in the first of a weird duology of racing games.

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A short Ace Attorney style game featuring Mario. Solve the murder of Princess Peach by listening carefully to testimonies and sniping down lies with evidence!

games.author: Gapple
games.description: An action game that pays homage to Super Mario

games.author: busy
games.description: From the same creator of Red Remover, it's a little game where you draw a line for the ball. Avoid the spikes!

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: Amazing pixel art, could easily be an indie Steam game.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: This game became a trend back in the day, a meme, a new way of playing platformers, who knows.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: If you ever wondered how a flash game of the final scene from Zorba the Greek would be, look no more !

games.author: RB
games.description: Diesel and Death is a 2d racing flash game where you play as Death and your objective is to defeat Diesel in each round, whether by using powerups or finishing 1st place. It is made by 3rd Sense Australia, the same developers of Swords and Sandals. There are reskins of this game that are also made by 3rd Sense, "Popebox Racer", and "Hawaiian Runner"

games.author: RB
games.description: A 3D bowling game made by Skunk Studios. It's a simple bowling game, with various bowling ball designs, a funny commentator, and banger music by Ronkat Spearman. The full version of the game has more to offer.

games.author: RB
games.description: The sequel of Doodle God, this mixing game has 2 new episodes compared to the previous one!

games.author: RB
games.description: A poker game in a western setting. The full version of the game allows you to explore more cities and a chance to become the Governor of Texas.

games.author: RB
games.description: An FPS browser game. You've read that right, it's an FPS BROWSER game. The devs did an amazing job making a high-level game using the Shockwave plugin. At first glance you'd think this was released on Steam, but no, this was a Shockwave game. Only sad about this is that it's in "Beta", implying that there could've been more to the game. But not knowing what a "Beta" means as a child, this game looked and felt complete to me. There also exists "Phosphor Alpha".

games.author: RB
games.description: A Marble Madness-like game released in 2004 with various levels and various obstacles. The full version of the game has more to offer.

games.author: RB
games.description: In 2008, GoBit made their own plugin to make the web version of Burger Shop. They would work with Eggo a year later to create the advergame "Eggo Kitchen". The web version of Burger Shop 2 would then be made in Flash, along with the advergame version they made working with Pillsbury called "Pillsbury - Toaster Strudel: Breakfast Rush".

games.author: LutayOvich
games.description: It's a mad dash to service cars and keep the customer happy!

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: A puzzle game with 50 levels where you try to combine every yellow blob into one. The last levels are pretty hard, I'm warning you...

games.author: childishbeat
games.description: YOU JUST GOT RICKROLLED!1!

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: Remember the Hot Coffee scandal from GTA ? Well, this is definitely not it.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: Grab your top hat and jump on this cool and short game.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: A 3 level platformer, which was lost for decades. Fortunately, we managed to find the missing levels for you to enjoy.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: A game with 90 vibes. If you like games like Jazz JackRabbit, Zool, etc. give this one a try.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: This is part 2, a trilogy of a pretty nice series of puzzle games similar to Adventures of Lolo from the NES. Don't miss the first 8 games which comprises the first part.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: You have 400 ingame years to beat this puzzly game.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: A game from the 80s tv show, if you get a high score you unlock a special ending !

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: Taringa is one of the biggest latin communities since the 2000s, and it's going to close this 2024. Here is a game based on this popular site.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: A demo for one of the most popular visual novels outside of Japan. Who is Zero?

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: More known nowadays as a Steam game, but here you have access to all the older builds. You might find surprising old stuff in them!

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: A nice little adventure game featuring the most famous detective. Don't miss the other games in the series.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: A great idea from greek mythology. Challenging short game with a unique twist and even a final boss. A true classic.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: Hide the fart, a game that everyone seemed to have played at least once in the last 2 decades. Not the most brilliant game, but probably one of the inspirers of the same mechanics kissing games.

games.author: DarkMoe
games.description: First in a series of 12 adventure games, in a similar vein to an escape the room game.

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: Try to name over 211 different video game characters! This game is really challenging, so are you able to get all achievements?

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: OH NO! The boss has destroyed your spaceship! Go through 3 worlds, 4 levels each and collect all the spaceship parts! Try to get every achievement. This is a high quality platformer made by Funtomic and Bamtang.

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: Did you ever want to fight a bunch of bosses in games, but there were only a few of them or the levels were too distracting? Well then this game is for you! Fight 12 different bosses on 3 difficulties, Simple, Challenging and Deadly. Can you try to get every achievement and beat the final, 13th boss?

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: In this puzzle game, draw a path with your mouse to guide the sugar to the right cups. This one's a series, but 3 is one of my favorites since it has the best aspects of the first 2. Try them all!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Castle Cat is on another mission. This time in Las Vegas. Help the Castle Cat defeat the mighty Great Sphinx of Giza.

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: 21 mini-games, do you have the skills to beat them all and to become the Ninja Glove?

games.author: ZodiaKGalXy
games.description: Similar to the game P0rtal, but much cooler looking! :O

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Help Harry to collect batteries, stay away from acid, and shoot the enemies, in order to escape the Acid Factory!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: The sequel to Chaos Faction. Can you defeat all of the enemies and unlock all of the characters?

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Doodle God gives you the ability to combine all sorts of elements, until you managed to make all of them.

games.author: Cheesey
games.description: The original toys-to-life game, fully playable in-browser. A built-in Funkey selector also means you can play as any character without the hub or figurines. For a fuller and more updated restoration project, look up OpenFK and the fan Discord!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Stack all of the shapes, and complete all of the levels!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: If you enjoy monopoly, Big Bucks is for you!

games.author: Gapple
games.description: It's a Final Fantasy style game filled with Japanese memes from around 2006.

games.author: Shoresh
games.description: A great escape-the-room game with a clever, well executed gimmick. Kotorinosu / Mani is a quality developer, I highly recommend checking out their other games.

games.author: Arges
games.description: This is an addictive and highly influential game that spawned many clones and similar games.

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Street race, use weapons and upgrade and customize your car! Ready to race?

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: The sequel to Chrome Wars. Are you ready to upgrade, customize your robot, and battle against other robots in tournaments?

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Get ready to go on a mission to battle against tons of different robotic entities. Can you defeat them all?

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Cute RPG game, where you control the tiny warrior, that has the goal of saving the kingdom, from all sorts of enemies!

games.author: Arges
games.description: It's the near future. Obama's healthcare plan passed. Fight Obama in this game!

games.author: Gust
games.description: An Adventure Time strategy game with a really fun gimmick of fusing items for different stat boosts or new items altogether, highly replayable if you want to find all of the possible combinations.

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Two player puzzle game, where together you have to color all sorts of places, and defeat the bosses!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Are you ready to battle against tons of other robots, and shapeshift into multiple variations of our hero?

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: You don't need lots of levels when you only have ONE. Go through 30 variations of the same exact level. Try to speedrun it!

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: Remember This Is The Only Level? The Blue Elephant lost all the other levels again... how? Go through 30 different variations of the same, but different level. Now there's different unlockable modes and skins! Try to get them all!

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description:
Remember This Is The Only Level 1 and 2? The Blue Elephant only has one level with him once again! Go through 30 variations of the same, but even more different level. You can now shoot pastries! Also, there's door portals and a cool lever in the middle now! There may be no more skins, but the modes are still there! And there's one more than in the previous game!
Jimp also made the artwork, so you know it will  be great!

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: Do you just love getting achievements in games to 100% them? Me too. This is why you should play Achievement Unlocked. This has over 99 achievements! Try to speedrun this game.

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: Remember Achievement Unlocked? Now there's a sequel! Get over 250 ACHIEVEMENTS! There's 6 floors in-game, and a money system! You should also try to speedrun this as well.

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: You played the first 2 AU games, now it's time for a third one! Now there's 400 ACHIEVEMENTS. You have to give a hamster (which is actually a guinea pig) 600 pellets. Go through 10 rooms, collect coins, and most important, get achievements! Your elephant can also shoot pastries and hamsters, by the way. Jimp also worked on the artwork, so the game will look good! Make sure to check out jmtb02's other games too!

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: Ugh, Wooly stole your cool bowler hat! You're going to have to go defeat him to get it back! Go through various areas, talk to the other fellow elephants and collect some cool items! While we're at it, why not also complete the in-game quests? This is a very good platformer if you are bored and want to spend some time playing games. By the way, you should go check out the other games created by jmtb02 if you already beat this!

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: Your goal is to get loot from 100 train cars! Destroy the train cars with either a sword, gun or magic weapon. Though, watch out, because some train cars have turrets on them! Will you be able to successfully beat the game?

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: A game which is entirely played in the browser's URL bar. Kill all the a's as fast as possible!

games.author: Piratebr1
games.description: a forgotten adult swin game where a simple blue planet rebels against the orbit and anything that floats

games.author: tymime
games.description: A charmingly crusty Shockwave game from Cartoon Network, featuring everyone's favorite character... Uncle Gus? The perfect game for summertime nostalgia. (Be sure to check out the other 3 episodes too!)

games.author: Alej2006
games.description: This is a Ben 10 game released in 2007 that based the live action movie of same name

games.author: childishbeat
games.description: If you already thought 4Kids's censoring of anime 4Kids was bad, have a look at this Flash game that almost looks like a fangame from Newgrounds! With slippery controls and blasts from enemies that can hit you without warning, this is hands down the worst officially licensed Sonic webgame in existence. And don't forget that every time you go back to the main menu, another instance of the music starts looping, which will almost force you to restart the game so you don't become insane.

games.author: Kalevi
games.description: Gravity Duck is an puzzle platformer involving the ability to flip gravity!

games.author: Kalevi
games.description: Gravity Duck 2 is the sequel to the first game. Flip gravity!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: The first episode of THE sprite series which has inspired creators for almost 2 decades with its adrenaline-pumping fight scenes and choreography

games.author: childishbeat
games.description: You're gonna need to be a real word boss to do well at this one, because it's very challenging! With just two minutes on the clock to guess a large variety of words ranging anywhere from three to six characters, somehow completing this test should be enough to anyone to qualify for Mensa!

games.author: Gust
games.description:
Spanish: Juego de cartas en el que tu y tu equipo de futbol compiten para vencer a todos los campeones de diferentes shows de Cartoon Network.
English: Card game in which you and your football team compete to beat all of the champions from different Cartoon Network shows.

games.author: Gapple
games.description: Please turn all moai to the front within the time limit.

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A short and mysterious game about exploring a quiet galaxy, and trying to rebuild a home that was destroyed. Smooth controls, but be careful around black holes!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A clever platformer-like puzzle game involving manipulating a letter by its very serifs. (Serifs are the lines on the edges of a letter!)

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A cute little RPG about raising a mythical fox-like creature to rid the world from darkness! Explore new lands, give them lots of pets, and look for some elusive paintbrushes along the way.

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A very comprehensive character creator with lots of bonus details such as outfits, extra Pokemon, and more. Make the trainer of your dreams!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: One of the coolest games on PBS Kids back in the day. Link animals together by their traits and fill the board to earn points!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: This one's for all the completionists out there. Platform your way to get all the objects and obtain that legendary 100 percent!

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: Lilo & Stitch is one of Disney's best known franchises, and this game is also one of Disney's best known Flash games. Not just Disney, but Flash as a whole. In this game, you must make Reuben a sandwich. Be careful to avoid the icky ingredients! If you haven't seen Lilo & Stitch: The Series (the tie-in), you should.

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A puzzle game themed around Legos. Guide a small robot to gather all the trash in the factory and use lego blocks to get him around!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: An escape game with many rooms and different puzzles to solve. Enter dimensional doors in search of your lost brother!

games.author: Kaiky Alexandre Souza
games.description: A side-scrolling platformer game with 5 levels, due to it's popularity, i think you should play it.

games.author: Han Han
games.description: You are a car, and you have to fight car monsters

games.author: Master of tax evasion
games.description: This game is fire(bug)

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Load your own MP3 and play a rhythm game automatically generated based of the music

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: Carve some epic pumpkins!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Fight against the formidable Princess of Equestria in an Undertale-style fight. If you kill her, she will be gone forever. Can you find her (very unusual) weakness?

games.author: Kalevi
games.description: Emily navigates the Magic Maze in this simple but fun puzzle game.

games.author: BoyDixon Entertainment
games.description: Due to the recent discontinuation of Cartoon Network's website, I felt it would be appropriate to recommend one of it's many former games. Here's one from the era I grew up in from one of the last remains of Cartoon Network's identity.

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Duke Dashington is on the search for the treasure that lies within great dungeons. The only problem is that EVERY TIME he finds one it immediately starts collapsing. You must dash through the dungeon to get the treasure before it becomes the grave for you and the treasure!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: A simple hack and slash which tasks you with room after room of enemies, intense visual effects, and hand-hurting button mashing. Play with a controller if you can!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Jump, dive and roll through the spikey and convoluted labyrinth of caves in a criminally tight platformer boasting a high  skill-expression despite using the arrow keys and 2 buttons!

games.author: Digginbloke
games.description:
My favourite Flash game for a long time as a kid in a series that lasted from 2008(9?)-2018. Although quite simple and a bit lacking in ways, it always put a smile on my face, plus who could forget the game's main theme?

30 levels with a variety of funny outcomes and bright colours with a happy (albeit simple) story to tie it in will surely make anyone's day, NotDOPPLER guarantee!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: A criminally tight platformer which doubles as a forearm workout due the sheer precision required!

games.author: Gust
games.description: Run your own lemonade stand and try to get as much money as possible in 30 days. Manage your recipe, prices, and advertising.

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Super D is on a mission to collect faces and defeat the evil "boss" cube. Can you help Super D?

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: This giant maze game goes to many countries of the world. Guide Harry through them all to assemble the golden wheel!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Bake pies by dragging the required ingredient tiles to complete orders. This puzzle game is really fun at higher levels where you'll need to plan your next move.

games.author: .di5corduser2000
games.description: An Adobe Shockwave game that is addictive for those who want to beat their own high score based on a Cartoon Network show that is still currently unavailable after it was taken off of the air except for the pilot special that is available on one of The Powerpuff Girls D.V.D. and one of The Powerpuff Girls V.H.S. tapes. Help Sheep avoid getting caught by the military by using his balloons to float down off the building.

games.author: Regrt.
games.description: A very dedicated representation of Brazilian culture, mixed with intense and exciting combat. A game crafted with great care

games.author: .di5corduser2000
games.description: Help Buck Tuddrussell travel through time and literally battle against time.

games.author: .di5corduser2000
games.description: One of the best and most popular Cartoon Network web games. Play as Samurai Jack as you jump from platform to platform while slashing through evil demons. Use the codes to unlock special weapons that help you through the levels.

games.author: SpongeBob
games.description: Super Mario Bros. but with characters from other franchises

games.author: Superior Wave
games.description:
The Kaboose game to end all Kaboose games!
Transylmania 2 features seven levels, new enemies and even a final boss!
It's a perfect time to play this game throughout October!

games.author: .di5corduser2000
games.description: Choose Courage Team (Courage The Cowardly Dog) or Johnny Bravo Team (Johnny Bravo) to play soccer against the latter.

games.author: Renegát
games.description: Have you wondered about playing tennis without gravity? Hold your racket in the right position, and try to not fly away from the ball!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Escape prison as the death-defying and rule-breaking jewel thief Ziggy Fraud!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Find the way out, and defeat the evil shark, if you can!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Do you have a strategy? Can you lead your team, and defeat the other teams?

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Create and control your team. Defeat all the other teams!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Are you able to fulfill a small mission, filled of various tasks?

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Help the mouse collect all the cheese, but be careful from the spikes, and other traps!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Help Zed defeat all the enemies, and escape the underworld...

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: Happy Thanksgiving! This is is the same as the other game, but with more minigames!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Escape this monochromatic world by using a simple barcode scanner to reveal the truth.

games.author: Superior Wave
games.description: The Evil Elves are back again, and it's up to Santa to gather all the Christmas presents before Christmas Day!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Gather magical candy and banish monsters in this short Halloween themed game!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Play as a ghost and crash the halloween party! The more people you scare, the better your haunts get.

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: The Gengar evolution line will trick you, so go the opposite way that they tell you. But watch out for helpful Pumpkaboo who steer you right!

games.author: Superior Wave
games.description: Vampy the Vampire makes his vampiric debut in this classic Flash game from 2005! He bites humans and sleeps in his coffin with his cuddly Deadly Bear! It's a fun game for all of you vampire lovers out there, bleh-bleh-bleh!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Ready for history lessons? Are you able to complete all 36 mini-games, from around the World?

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Monopoly with puzzle games, do you have the IQ to reach the finish line first?

games.author: Matt
games.description: A fun but challenging bullet hell where you take control of a Captain trying to save 5 cats!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Ziggy's back, and this time he's got his eyes set on the king's crown! This time there's multiple endings and a few cheeky secrets to be found.

games.author: ViceChats
games.description:
A classic. fight your way through various opponents like: rayman goku chibi-robo and WALUIGI.
theres a variety of modes. so have fun and fight as you please

games.author: Gapple
games.description: Let's take care of the master who has caught a cold by controlling the Wan and Nyan!

games.author: SpongeBob
games.description: the hardest game of Papa's series. will you get the perfect score?

games.author: TheBusterZX
games.description: Autumn is here and what better way to celebrate it than have beloved Nicktoons beat each other up?

games.author: Gapple
games.description: Get the key and open the door!

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: 2D Minecraft before it was cool. What more needs to be said?

games.author: R.E.W
games.description: A infuriating platformer with portals that lead you to somewhere and precise jumping, figure out where the bells are and ring them in the correct order!

games.author: Han Han
games.description: Pretty short n' sweet game about guns

games.author: .di5corduser2000
games.description: The most underrated drawing Flash game. Nothing can top it.

games.author: Litness11
games.description:
Eat your heart out, Rudolph! 
Spread Christmas cheer by dropping presents into chimneys, but watch where you're going! Otherwise, you'll find yourself flying over other continents.

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Solve puzzles by throwing your slimeball through this frozen landscape! (Try the other Sling titles too if you like this one!)

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: In this game, create a thriving ecosystem by nurturing both plants and animals!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Can you beat all the races, and become the champion of the game?

games.author: Han Han
games.description: Grab the money and don't get your hand violently chopped off

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: This place is cursed by zombies. Can you save it from all the zombies?

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Test your reaction reflexes. Are you fast enough?

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A deceptively simple auto-battle RPG. As you explore the realms, you'll gain access to new weapons, armor, and other skills to dominate your foes. For a real challenge, take on the extra levels after the main game!

games.author: TheBusterZX
games.description: Aren't you lucky not to be a turkey for thanksgiving? As a challenge, try to beat my  record of 69650 points.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description:
Released back in September 2019 on international Nick sites for Spongebob's 20th anniversary (of the show, not the character) and now it's five years later as of writing, the year of its 25th anniversary. Help the sponge of honor help his friends have their best day ever in this escape-the-room game, developed by game studio Seven2. (Tip: For the best ending message, see if you can play from start to end in under eight minutes.)

Featuring many iconic references and easter eggs from old and new episodes of the show, as well as secretly harboring unused graphics, such as misunderstood inner beauty icon Yummer.

games.author: walker21232123
games.description:
Bad Monday Simulator is a action-packed Garfield-Undertale crossover fan game. You play as Nermal and you are fighting Sansfield, which is a Fusion of Garfield and Sans.

Fun Fact: Undergarf is the Second Undertale AU based on Garfield. The first one is An Expanded Universe.

games.author: cezarr
games.description: A classic Flash puzzle game where you can give your hidden sadistic desires a chance to shine!

games.author: KurttheKing
games.description: xGerms Math Mashup is an educational game in which you must collect various germs for research by solving math problems. With 38 achievements, a character creator, and a perfect amount of polish, you can't go wrong!

games.author: EvanPBanks
games.description: Ed, Edd n Eddy meets Tony Hawk

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: A Christmas-styled endless jumper! Try to get every medal.

games.author: JollyMushroom602
games.description: A funny launch game (like Toss the Turtle or Learn to Fly) where an alcoholic Santa must perform his mission and go as far as possible.

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: Here's a Christmas flash game from Russia. The gameplay is simple, try to bounce as many ornaments as you can. Don't let too many of them fall, or it's game over!

games.author: TheBusterZX
games.description: A 5v1 Snowball Fight between you and the obnoxious kids from School. Show no mercy!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: The classic restaurant game! Can you serve all the hungry penguins?

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Help deliver the presents for Christmas!

games.author: Lukisav
games.description: Can you take control of the constant traffic, and win the game?

games.author: Claudiu
games.description: Hit the pinata to get candy... so you can get upgrades to HIT IT HARDER

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Score as many goals as you can to defeat the opposition.

games.author: SpongeBob
games.description: an christmas endless jumper with The Fairly OddParents theme

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A vampire wants to feast at McDonalds, and he's not hungry for a burger. Fortunately, you're a vampire hunter. Can you use your wits to stop him before someone drops dead?

games.author: R.E.W
games.description: A story game about a hungry dragon, finish the jigsaw puzzle and have fun seeing the story unfold

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Design and decorate a room for Christmas. Lots of gifts to stack under the tree! Get into the holiday spirit in this special edition of your favorite room-decorating game! Click on the catalogue to the right to choose your items. Click the arrows in the upper-right corner to choose a location: would you rather have a beach house, penthouse, or an underwater house? Change music styles by clicking on the jukebox or stereo. Paint your items and walls your favorite colors with the Brush and Wallpaper buttons. Click the buttons at the bottom to rotate furniture, delete items, or print your room.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Based on a cute+hilarious Cartoon Network show that turned 20 this year (as of writing). Cartwheel with monkeys, dance with cobras, slingshot unfriendly pirates out of the way, and more as you search for all 250 coins and 100 gems on this crazy island. Try not to be lost as you search for chests containing additional abilities, and mind your health and energy! (Tip: if you see a palm tree with red leaves, or large spikes with tiny gem specks, use the electric guitar. Some treasure is well hidden.)

games.author: AL_2713
games.description: A simple and relaxing puzzle game. Match blocks as you listen to the distant fireworks

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Quickly take photos of silly scenes, but be sure to follow the rules of the request. How high can your score reach?

games.author: TheBusterZX
games.description: Protect the Krusty Krab from Plankton's obnoxious robot carolers.

games.author: TheBusterZX
games.description: Team up with friends in the neighborhood to defeat the local snow-bullies and get your snow racer back!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Are your tricks tough enough? Does your routine rock? Is your outfit awesome? In the world of competitive figure skating, you'll be judged on every aspect of your performance!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Break the ice in this arcade style hockey game with 12 teams, 11 games, and even a few fights!

games.author: Bosko Lasta
games.description: zuma king com  swf

games.author: childishbeat
games.description: See just how big of a combo you can build in this New Years-themed game, perfect for reigning in, well, the new year! With all that said, have a good one.

games.author: childishbeat
games.description: No, seriously, where is it? LOL.

games.author: childishbeat
games.description: I may have played tons of Flash games back in my day, but this isn't one of them. And that's a shame, because this one's not only pretty good, but a cut above the rest too. Full story? Voice acting? Hours of combat? Not something you'd hear of too often in the scene. You'd definitely have wanted to play this one in your local computer lab if you knew all that! Oh, and it's this game's 17-year anniversary, so it's almost old enough to be an adult now.

games.author: childishbeat
games.description: You know I like me a good tower defence game, and I must say, this one's pretty honourable.

games.author: childishbeat
games.description: The developer's right. It is that boring.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Are you ready to fight some of the most relevant figures of 2011?

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A very creative puzzle adventure game featuring Blue Rabbit. When the weather goes awry on Blue's vacation, they'll have to travel and use strange magic to solve the problem!

games.author: ©hloe™
games.description: One of Ferry Halim's most popular games, potentially even being a pioneer for the endless jumper genre. A unique aesthetic combined with simple yet addictive gameplay make this one a must play.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Looks like another smiling block, but this cube has mad skillz! Capture the stars to open your portal. Drive a tilty car, cut ropes, flip switches and jump over spikes to complete your mission. Cute never looked so smooth!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Hey, DJ! Keep the needle in that phat groove, baby! Demonstrate your scratch skills to score big!

games.author: Katsuki Bakugo 💣 💥🧨 (elfhuo)
games.description: Screw around with her teeth in any way you like

games.author: Han Han
games.description: Amazing shooter game with great physics (at least for flash) great gunplay, and 5 long levels. Sadly, the game has no music, so turn on your tunes!

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Nick.com's main attraction of 2015 (a decade ago) was a card battle game featuring special virtual trading cards from a whopping 32 Nick shows (the most shows featured in an officially licensed Nick game) and seven different stories to play through. Customize your card deck to bring into battle, and find out if your cards are powerful enough to defeat all of your opponents! In addition to this game, Workinman also produced eleven (11) other Nick games that were released throughout 2015, and each reveal a code that can be entered in Power Packed to unlock a special (or random) card.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: The first of 11 games to reveal a code for Nickelodeon Power Packed. Defend the Nickelodeon kingdom of your choice in this tower defense game, and seize relics in other kingdoms to gain territory! This game was also a very special one (months before Power Packed released), as three features were made to accompany this game: Castle Combat, an archery game made for mobile devices (while the main Kingdoms game was originally meant for desktop only); a countdown clock to the release day of Kingdoms; and a personality quiz, titled "What's Your Nick Kingdom?"

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: The second of 11 games to reveal a code for Nickelodeon Power Packed. The Ninja Turtles' human friend April has been kidnapped by a ghost, and the Turtles must sneak across the rooftops to save her. Take down foot soldiers, flip levers, disable teleporters, and don't get caught or make too much noise! (Tip: select the Robo Turtle for later levels. There are many doors to unlock as well.)

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: The third of 11 games to reveal a code for Nickelodeon Power Packed. See how many times in a row you can get a direct hit with a crumpled piece of paper, but mind the blowing fan.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Game 4 of 11 in the Nickelodeon Power Packed game series. Guide a Nick character through a complex maze and find the exit door with as few enemy collisions as possible.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Game 5 of 11 in the Nickelodeon Power Packed game series. Play around with SpongeBob and his pals, watch what happens when you give one of them an item to play with, and watch out for seagulls! See if you can unlock all the items and complete all the tasks on the checklist.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Game 6 of 11 in the Nickelodeon Power Packed game series. Two friends sneak into their local arcade after hours to uncover a secret game they've never played before. Punch out foe after foe and see how many floors you can survive through, and if you can beat the characters' scores. Dodge the enemies' attacks before they drain your health! (Based on "Hook'd" from "Tufflips' Tales of Terror", the Halloween episode of Sanjay & Craig.)

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Game 7 of 11 in the Nickelodeon Power Packed game series. The Breadwinners and their rivals and female counterparts, the Pizzawinners, must team up to defeat an onslaught of pond monsters. See how many giant monsters you can beat before you run out of health. (Based on the Breadwinners episode "Pizzawinners".)

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Game 8 of 11 in the Nickelodeon Power Packed game series. In this webgame-based steampunk sequel to the SpongeBob TV episode "The Great Patty Caper" (a.k.a. Mystery with a Twistery), SpongeBob must tend to flipping Krabby Patties while his friends keep them safe from Plankton's bots. See how many levels you can beat!

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Game 9 of 11 in the Nickelodeon Power Packed game series. Help the Ninja Turtles hack their way into TCRI by connecting wires. See how many puzzles you can solve before you run out of time. (Note: the Power Packed game code only appears after five gameplays.)

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Game 10 of 11 in the Nickelodeon Power Packed game series. See if you can beat Patrick in a beach-themed game of checkers! (You can also pop any bubbles that float by if you want!)

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Create and raise a cute little sea snail in the SpongeBob universe. (Note: This is the 11th and last game in the Nickelodeon Power Packed game series, although the only one not to feature a special code pop-up. There is however a Snail Care card that can be unlocked in Power Packed by entering the code "meow". It features the same exact snail that is shown on the Snail Care title screen.)

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Help a Lost Rock Band get to their next gig without being mobbed by star-crazed crowds!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A semi-idle game where you play as a dragon! Farm your own sheep and conquer the lands with your fire breath!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A very unique and funny physics game about controlling a wild helicopter through mazes, puzzles, and many other things. Just don't make the button cry...

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: If you liked the first Hanna in a Choppa, this one's even more refined! Smoother controls, lots more to unlock, and even more creative challenges to conquer.

games.author: nikki
games.description: Two bunnies prepare food for an upcoming party! Remember the ingredients written on a note and drag the ingredients to the bowl. That's basically it! (Also, who puts flour in green tea?!)

games.author: Mustacheboyo
games.description: Ice treats and fun times await! Serve up chocolaty goodness and creamed sweets to all your happy monster friends from behind the counter of your very own Ice Cream restaurant.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Rev your engines and return to Rumble Town for 4 new challenges every day!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Arrive within time and miss less than three gates.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Do you have what it takes to be the basketball champions on the court in this fast and furious 2 on 2 game for the showboaters who love to impress the crowd? Show off your skills and perform spectacular air defying dunks, amazing dribbles and a tight defense for crucial last second blocks to be crowned king of the basketball arena!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description:
Without your help Gwen, Gabriella, and Grace will be tardy to their party!
Use your eye for detail, your dress-up skills, and your makeover know-how to get the girls to the fashion party on time. First, find any missing items scattered around the house. You're looking for things like shoes, clothes, and make-up. Then head over to their closet and get them all gussied up—don't forget to apply make-up! Do all of this before time's up to get them out the door in time.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Take part in an epic journey and experience history's first road trip. Simultaneously drive various animal drawn carts and hit the targets. Go it alone or play with a friend. Passing each level requires a good arm and sense of right and wrong! Hit oxen, but not on their heads; collect apples, but not forbidden fruits. Think you can do it? Think can you survive Year One? Find out when you play online now!

games.author: nikki
games.description: A woman has to find her magic ring and learn about her family, or something. A finding-hidden-objects game about fortunetelling, summoning a spirit, and repeatedly reading Cassandra as a shooter because this is a Flash game. (Or maybe that's just me.)

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description:
Fast cars! Explosive action! This is ON THE RUN!

Take the wheel and make your getaway! The cops are on your tail - get to the next checkpoint before time runs out! Show off your driving skills: catch the slipstream of other cars to go even faster, and build up a combo for super-speed! Smash your way to freedom: collect boosts to clear a destructive path through traffic!

Ride with style: your style! Choose your car from a large fleet, then upgrade your ride to make it even faster and stronger. Look out for transporter trucks to grab a special vehicle! Fancy a bigfoot? We got ya. Feeling more like riding a tank? No problemo. Perhaps with a side of warplanes? We got that too, and then some!

What are you waiting for? Get in, hit the gas and let’s go On The Run!

games.author: swetdep
games.description: A metroidvania that focuses on enemy slaying, finding new weapons with rpg elements to it such as a skill tree. It features a neat gameplay and a great attention to detail - keep your eye for some easter eggs!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: School can be a dog-eat-dog world... With your brother's help, can you escape the gauntlet of learning to type properly?

games.author: nikki
games.description: You are a bean living in an apartment. In only 3 days, you go from buying aloe vera for somebody to getting hired by a gang. It only escalates from here.

games.author: Katsuki Bakugo 💣 💥🧨 (elfhuo)
games.description: Help Baby Hazel do Strange things like bathe in milk, chocolate, and other stupid crap

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: You've got a full day of to-dos, so hop in your car and get started! Everyone is ready to go and it's your job to speed around town dropping them off and picking them up, while collecting points and power-ups, like extra time or a spiffy new paint job. Use your trusty map and T-Mobile® G1 to navigate and run as many errands as you can before the clock runs out! Move fast and you could earn some "me" time at the local spa. Or stop by the T-Mobile® store to set up the entire family with myFaves! Get the fun rolling when you play fast and frenzied T-Mobile® Fuel Mom online now!

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: The PC game themed around CN City, Cartoon Network's main theme as of 20 years ago, and featuring a few clips and loads of scenery from that era. Clear each board of blobs without running out of drops. Play through a 50-puzzle world tour, or an endless loop, or play the extra-hard way by clearing entire boards in just one or two drops!

games.author: pHOEniX_05
games.description: for this Valentine's, one of the most popular flash games is definitely appropriate ;p

games.author: Gapple
games.description: Find the Escape-Men series Valentine's Day edition

games.author: nikki
games.description: You are a zombie. They are a zombie too. You play a game of tag across the world. You are a couple. I guess that makes it Valentines related.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: In this carnival-themed Valentine's game, hit as many targets as you can before the time runs out. Reach the quota in each level to unlock retro Nick characters, but don't hit Cupid or your progress towards the goal will be set back!

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: The biggest feature ever hosted on a Millsberry domain, in full with all five worlds! Battle wasp characters while armed with only a wand of honey, complete task after task to go up against a notorious supervillain, and feel free to explore each world in whichever areas you can. (But don't fall off the edge of the world or you'll have to restart!) Collect at least 200 coins total for a fully-upgraded wand, and 400 coins total for the title of Honey Defender!

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: The game that kept everyone glued to their phones in a Sam & Cat episode, named after this match-3 with a twist. There are five gears of different colors and the goal is to make them grow in size until they drop down and crush the brains directly below. (Released as part of Nick's "Crush Night", which was technically themed around Valentine's Day. This is a different theme however.)

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: A love triangle featuring a longing girl, her crush, and... the moon? Click and drag to give this couple many different endings.

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Share the love with a heartbroken monkey by finding the hearts hidden throughout the levels.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Bring joy to Umbrella Man by helping him travel as far as possible!

games.author: tomrichardson1993
games.description: This game is so iconic, and fun to play as a 13 year old.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Mix and match to make a hilarious happy ending!

games.author: N4L

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Guide a couple of cartoon J-Rock stars to their concert in 12 levels spread across four different regions. Dodge crazed fans, rockets, meteors, mountain goats and penguins, trap sea creatures in bubbles with torpedos, and don't run out of lives or energy!

games.description: When Glove World closed back in 2012, Glove Universe took its place. Nearly three years after that, it became a playable game, IRL! Briefly closed and then updated 10 years ago in time for Valentine's Day, with additional Valentine's themed rides and attractions. Toss coins in cups without getting scammed by Mr. Krabs, slam down a mallet to see if you can launch Squidward over the top of the sea, ride the Fiery Fist O' Pain (sequel), and lots else!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Now enjoy Cricket in 3D

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Play as an adventurer kid, a cowboy, a penguin, or Abraham Lincoln and see how far you can trek across the Wild West, the Great Plains, or the Eastern Express.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Based on the second SpongeBob movie which is now 10 years old. SpongeBob and his friends have turned into superheroes and arrived on the beach, and must defeat an evil pirate to save their home town!

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: "This is what happens when you don't share" - Truffles

games.author: N4L
games.description: Pick your new puppy! You can take care of it, feed it, teach it tricks, bathe it, and more! Game changes scenery at different seasons.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Dial up your dream date—he's just a phone call away!

games.author: N4L
games.description: Want have some platforming fun? Well, play Spring into Action! Drop platforms and collect all of the Jellies to reach Patrick!

games.author: N4L
games.description: Complete each quest Eda gives you in this fun platformer made by Workinman! Features unique voice lines from the original voice actors!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Show off your kicking skills in Pro Kicker Frenzy as you kick a series of field goals for big points. Aim carefully and score combos to earn extra points. Watch out for the linebackers and don't forget to pay attention to the wind! Start at the college level and then join the pros as you prove your skills. Can you get a perfect score?

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Explore a strange alien planet as a native species! This Metroidvania has challenge, a great story, and even some secret areas to find. Can you get the best ending and free the planet?

games.author: AL_2713

games.author: Saril
games.description: Your world: one dojo. Your goal: become the best duelist in the world. Sharpen your body and mind against bandits, monsters and horrors in Sinjid!

games.author: Lukisav

games.author: Claudiu

games.author: Gapple
games.description:
A game produced by Japanese musician Tamio Okuda.
◯◯Otoko Raise a into a fine musician!

games.description: Beat all the racers, and defeat all the robots!

games.author: MagicOSM
games.description: Try to guess 20 titles from the best console from 1980's!

games.description: Delve deep on a fastasic mission to save the rock legend from 80s hell! Arena shooter with multiple weapons, 8 bosses, and lots of fun.

games.author: tomrichardson1993
