games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Drive your tractor through the dangerous levels and deliver your cargo.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: The game where getting abducted by aliens is a good thing.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description:
Drag and drop objects to create a clear path for the train
to travel across safety.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: The SpongeBob Boat-o-Cross series began 15 years ago. Since the first installment was already spotlighted here once before, I will skip ahead to the second one. This sequel introduces vehicle customization, multiple characters to play as, and six different worlds. Reach the finish line without landing upside-down against any terrain. It's that simple, yet that frustrating. Oh, and the boat may tilt backwards when you don't want it to. Have fun!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description:
You are a train conductor and its up to you to deliver the loads.
Go for the high score, but be sure not to lose your load along the way.
Do you have what it takes to be the best.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: A sequel to Boat-o-Cross 2, this time with characters and worlds from different Nick shows, and in HTML5. This game started out as a stealth release, requiring an 8-character code, consisting of letters and numbers that could be found on the back of certain Albertsons' products, in order to unlock the game itself, followed by other codes in order to unlock certain characters, vehicle designs and wheels. Now, all 26 items and 16 levels are unlocked! And thankfully, this is so much easier than the previous two Boat-o-Cross games. Enjoy!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Have you ever wanted to be a fire fighter? Well no you are the best firefighter in town and everyone needs you now. Put out all the fires on each level and save your friends. There is a limited supply of water so the strategy game is to solve the puzzle before the game is over.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Select your car and try to conquer the world one setting at a time. Upgrade to 8 new, faster and better cars as you progress. Select for 12 different types of upgrades that will give you an awesome chance at beating each world. Fill the sky with collectable nitros and other cool things ...

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Happy St. Patrick's Day! Play as a leprechaun, fly as high as you can and collect marshmallows... in space!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Defeat all opponents as you race to find the big boss. No-one can stand against you! Use your ninja skills to run across walls and leap massive games as you travel through shipping docks, slip through buildings and leap across the roof tops. Use your sword and shirukens to take down your enemies, making your way to a final confrontation with Boss Ninja. Play now!

games.author: Enderboy
games.description: Fancy Pants returns with a fresh adventure! Select your fanciest pants and get ready for World 2!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Travel around the world with Macy on a shopping adventure in this Personal Shopper sequel.

games.author: Rocko Rotten
games.description: What's your favorite Flash game? What makes it so great? After years of Flash game research, I think I've found one that's been scientifically proven to be the best. That very game is Tweenies Number Game. Tweenies Number Game is one huge metaphor for life, and not a lot of Flash games go into that territory. What do you do in this game? First, you pick a Tweenie, and then you have the option to select "easy" or "hard" mode. This symbolizes the though choice we make in our everyday lives, do we want to do it the hard way, or the easy way? In the end, what would be worth more, easy or hard? Once you have chosen your path, you get transported to this magical mystical world where your Tweenie awaits you. Numbers then flash on the screen, and you have to click a number that matches it. There is no punishment if you make the wrong choice, you can keep trying and trying. It's a lot like life. How does the game end? There is no end, you have the option to keep playing with the Tweenies for all eternity, or you can stop. This symbolizes the commitments in life we make. For example, do you want to keep working at the factory, or do you want to find a better job that pays more? Both choices have their pros and cons. Do you win in this game? Well, the game never indicates that you've won. However, the game leaves it up to you. Are you happy with your choices? Is it benefiting you? Not only is the gameplay compelling, but the sound design is the best out of any game ever made. You feel like you've been transported to a fantasy world, and that adds on to the game's immersion. Tweenies Number Game is so good, that you may never play another Flash game again, because there's nothing like it.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Take the Mayhem global in this international smash 'em sequel with 3 new locations available each day!

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Help Dusty Crophopper train and qualify for the Wings Around the Globe rally.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description:
So you always wanted to be a fire-fighter? Well now's your chance!

Take on the role of a robotic fire-fighter and take on Infernos in various locations across town, from the bowling alley to the cinema to the gas-works.

Features highly flammible and explosive gameplay. Includes oil barrels and petrol pumps that explode. Sprinklers to help keep the fire back. Fans that spread the fire to other areas via the air-ducts. People to rescue. Upgrade your firebot with coins you collect on the levels.

The levels literally burn down as you play!

games.author: Gapple
games.description: Get medicine from a monster infested town to save your hometown!

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: The latest Fairly OddParents spin-off series, A New Wish, is coming to Paramount Plus in about three weeks as of writing. (And I'm still hoping for a second season!) To celebrate this good sign, I decided to suggest this game. Since there aren't any webgames specifically based on A New Wish, this is the best pick I could think of. Reach the top in all 3 levels to retrieve Cosmo's wand, but watch out for Foop (who now goes by the name "Irep")!

games.author: Piratebr1
games.description: A game more comical than really adventurous, but I have to say that priceless to see Morty with piercing eyes offending the player, in fact the pixel art is very pleasant

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: This is one of the strangest (and most difficult) games I've ever played. Explore a fantastical ocean filled with mazes, surprises, and more!

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: An interactive science project! Select a Thing and watch it grow, then follow the generations to expand their genetic variety.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: In case you haven't heard, SpongeBob has just surpassed Arthur as THE longest-running animated kids' show of all time! And there's no sign of our absorbent hero slowing down, let alone stopping anytime soon. Let us celebrate with an iconic SpongeBob game, Bikini Bottom Brawlers! See if you can knock each of your opponents off the screen four times before they do that to you.

games.author: ezzed ra
games.description: Add up to four women and theme their appearances after the four classical elements.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Turbo Golf, a new sort of golf. Play a round of golf against the 3 other opponents while running between shots. The fastest finish in the least number of shots wins. Yes its golf but not as you know, with loads of upgrades to aquire and stats to pump up along with an entire round of holes including show, dinoasaurs, pirate boats and zombies...

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description:
Cyclomaniacs is back… and this time IT IS EPIC. The haddock has taken over a movie studio, or some such rubbish, and the cyclomaniacs have to defeat him. Again.

Unlock 30 riders, 60 bikes and 40 tracks and bonus games, almost a meelion hours of gameplay.

Use up for gas, left and right to tilt and x to Jump, or wasd controls and space. Perform stunts to gain boost to make you go faster.

games.author: Gust
games.description: Manage your own game shop full of rare items and try to collect them all for your collection.

games.author: Hydroxide
games.description: Roll through hilly islands to go as far (or as fast!) as you can!

See if you can flip all the pink switches to turn them green and then reach the clam, all within the time limit, but be warned, it's very challenging!

games.author: Hydroxide

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Race against the Crock bots and help Timmy and his fairies get that "threat-mantic" letter before it reaches Trixie's computer! (And before Timmy's dad finds out he's missing... inside a computer like the one you're using right now!)

games.author: evaneezer

Each difficulty has a total of ten (10) levels.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: A virtual Golfland, Cartoon Network style (circa 2003). So many colored golf balls to choose from, and nine decorative holes to play through! (And one of them doubles as a virtual pinball board. Bonus!)

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Three boards and eight mini-games to play. Scratch records DJ style, wipe away a delivery man's tears, give a Corn Pop piece a cool hairdo, test your knowledge about random trivia, and more as you earn 100 points in the quickest time.

games.author: Gapple
games.description: Make the man finish a large portion of curry!

games.author: evaneezer

Bounce and ascend your way through 30 levels, collecting power-ups and blasting away (or avoiding) enemies, and then battle a thief who is trying to make off with all the Pebbles! The levels get a little bit longer over time but this is one fun journey!

The game was also released on mobile devices during the same time the flash version came out. Can you reach the top of the world and get your high score?

games.author: Logan5855

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: The ultimate dog racing sim, train your dog over 20 weeks to try and win the biggest prize money you can. 8 Achievements to gain and try your hand at the odd bet by following the dogs form.

games.author: Logan5855
games.description: Can you beat Red's score in this Bejeweled-like M&M's themed game.

games.author: Kickety
games.description: Widget's Robo Cluck 3000 has gone haywire, and it's spitting eggs everywhere! Join Wubbzy with his amazing adventure collecting nuts and bolts along the way.

games.author: Logan5855
games.description: It's like having a food-fight in a movie theater! Try this game yourself and see how you like it.

games.author: Gapple

Rotate the neurons and connect them all!

games.description: a game i used to play that has cozy vibes, it requires puzzle solving and it has 3d animations

Multiple levels, and 4 different cars to buy, as well as multiple upgrades.

games.author: SANTACLAUS

Drive like a maniac to deliver packages on time, but don't wreck the company truck and drive your boss crazy. Mad Courier features:

Unlockable vehicles
Maps and guides
12 wild levels, plus 1 bonus challenge
Get in the driver's seat today!

games.author: tomrichardson1993
games.description: TMNT Pac-Man, this game was basically Pac-Man, but with the turtles instead of Pac-Man and the ghosts.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description:
Over two dozen food fanatics embarked on a cruise aboard the S.S. Louie to celebrate the long awaited unveiling of Seaside Freezeria. The celebration turns sour as Radley Madish and his new muscle, Luau LePunch, commandeer the ship.

Using the Warp Coins, Radley and company unleash a powerful portal to pull Papa Louie and the rest of the customers back to the Land of Munchmore. There, they are caged and held captive by Radley's growing army of Sundaesauruses -- an army that our captive chefs are unwillingly forced to create under the harsh direction of Radley himself.

Meanwhile, the lone Captain Cori must trek her way through Muchmore's wild terrain, battle fierce food baddies, and rescue her captive passengers and crew. As the customers are rescued, they join the fight as playable characters; each with their own unique weapon and skills.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: Great Isometric rally game. Unlock new cars, and upgrade as you rally across different contintents.

games.author: SANTACLAUS
games.description: How far can you explode, bat, and bounce your Sour Patch Kid?

games.author: TheBusterZX
games.description: If you don't hand people enough water bottles, this could affect Lebron's legacy.

games.author: Piratebr1

It's the definition of easy to learn, hard to master - anyone can pick it up and smash the level 0 or 1 bots, but it takes a true master to build up to the ultimate challenge - the False Gods. I've come back to it time and time again since stumbling across it ten years ago.

games.author: Logan5855
games.description: Defeat all of the bosses in Mario's boss endurance.

Click on any of those to properly meet Yummer! (To any remaining Yummer fans out there, you're welcome.) The alternate version also includes a ripped-up suit found outside Sandy's treedome, another previously unused feature. Enjoy!

games.author: Gapple
games.description:
"おめでとうございます！！
ちょうどあなたが、10000人目のアクセスです。"

You have accessed Kota's homepage. 
As you browse, something strange happens to the homepage...

games.author: tomrichardson1993
games.description: Today's the 20th anniversary of the long forgotten nicktoon, Catscratch, and to celebrate, here is one of many flash games based on the show.

games.author: Logan5855
games.description: The quarry's gone cocoa! Help Fred or Wilma make their way through the quarry maze.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: A little one-of-a-kind treat developed by Workinman, a studio which usually developed Nick webgames (and I wouldn't be suggesting this game here if not for that). Look for bulging stars in the night sky and click on each of them to form constellations of characters and objects from a certain franchise (whose owners are against emulation and are about to come out with a new console). Can you find all ten constellations?

games.author: Gapple
games.description: On this day in 2013, the idol unit ``Soleil'' was formed from the anime ``Aikatsu!'' by Ichigo Hoshimiya, Aoi Kiriya, and Ran Shibuki.

games.author: TheBusterZX
games.description: Summer has arrived and the brawl has hit the beach! Defeat all the Nicktoons and face your hardest challenge yet...........Patrick Star.

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: Seven2 is a wizard studio when it comes to escape-the-room games. Four years before the infamous SpongeBob Saves the Day, Seven2 also made this holiday-themed game, based on a 47-minute variety special featuring stars from eight different Nickelodeon teen sitcoms. Once you know how to beat all three levels (not counting the empty room that automatically skips in a few seconds), you can easily beat this in under three minutes. Help the kids escape before they miss Christmas (which apparently this entry already has by at least a day!)

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: To celebrate the winter holidays and Neopets having turned 25 recently, as well as to acknowledge its brief past with 3DVIA games, I think this makes a nice holiday treat. See if you can get a total of 60 Bruces (penguin-like creatures that wear bowties) each through the hoop that matches their respective colour (spelled with a 'U' as it is in Neopia). Be careful on the slippery ice, and watch out for Snow Beasts, changing colours and dizzying effects!

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: About a year before MP Game Studio started Nickelodeon's Brawl franchise with Jingle Brawl (which was 15 years ago), the same studio also made this Western-themed Billy & Mandy game for Cartoon Network's Latin-American website. Just like JB, this game has an arcade mode and tournament mode, fighters with special attacks and super attacks, a locked character that is supposed to be unlocked by winning tournament mode, stages with different music tracks, timed rounds, health bars, and the best-two-out-of-three-wins rule. The only feature missing: characters don't automatically face each other at all times. (Fun fact: all of the music in Billy the Kid shares the same tune which was later used in JB's Farm Road music track.)

games.author: evaneezer
games.description: An exclusive treat from Cartoon Network, based on a TV event that celebrated the incoming premiere of Camp Lazlo, 20 years ago. While this game suite doesn't feature Camp Lazlo itself, it features a camp theme and six of CN's contemporary shows at the time. There are six mini-games, each one based on a different CN show. Enjoy!

games.author: TheBusterZX
games.description: The running of the bulls but with a twist, in this extreme world run spanning 8 countries, you'll have to evade British officers, a big swedish spa guy in a towel, a drunk German woman with beer, swiss skiers and of course one angry spanish bull. The goal is simple: run and don't look back. Complete the world run to return to Pamplona, Spain and conclude the extreme running of the bulls in record time.
